author: Staff Reporter
text:
More than 50 members of Southern Railway Mazdoor Union staged a demonstration on platform No.1 at Dindigul railway station on Wednesday, condemning “the unruly behaviour and adamant attitude” of Chief Commercial Manager Ajeeth Saxena.

They alleged that the Chief Commercial Manager behaved rudely with women members of the SRMU in Chennai, when they met him to air their grievances. They demanded action against the official.
title: SRMU members demand action against official
